structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST PUBLIC HEALTH AND SAFETY

law.text: The Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control and the Department of Agriculture are authorized to promulgate administrative regulations pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A as necessary to implement and carry out the provisions of KRS 438.305 to 438.340.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1934, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994.
